Articles.Content: I've only just started playing around in the SPH, but Jeb and Bill seem to like what I have managed to produce so far, and even went for a spot of formation orbiting in my SSTO design.

Really Nice pic!

Gemini program used to train formation before the actual docking...

Can you do a 5 SSTO formation ?

I know someone made a mod called "EVA Follower" that made multiple Kerbals to follow a leader on EVA. I've never used it, but I wonder if it could be modified in such a way as to allow one craft to fly in formation with the other. By that, I mean actually have more than one vessel under acceleration and having them follow each other in a controlled fashion.
Will happen eventually if you fly enough planes. Snapped this when switching a couple over at a fuel tanker...
